title: Find us on Facebook!
content:
Submitted by [morten](http://web.archive.org/web/20090401210445/http:/typophile.com/user/2642 "View user profile.") : 2.Dec.2008 12.07am 

Fontpartners.com is now on Facebook! All about fonts: Start a new topic, display reviews, share links & events, etc.

Become a Fan:  
 [http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502](http://web.archive.org/web/20090401210445/http:/www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502 "http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502")
